What is GraphQL?

  • A query language for your API
  • A server-side runtime for executing queries
  1. When talking about GraphQL referring to two separate things
  2. Query (Schema) a way of retrieving data
  3. Runtime (Schema, Resolver, Logic) a way of resolving a query into data

Schema


# A Person
type Person {
   id: Int
   name: String
   profile: Profile
   friends: [Person]
}

# A Profile
type Profile {
   url: String
   photo: String
}

type RootQueryType {
   attendees: [Person]
   person(
       # The id to look for
       id: Int
   ): Person
}

schema {
   query: RootQueryType
}
  1. Type ANATOMY
  2. Fields functionallity dependant data (3NF)
  3. Relationships friends
  4. Schema: Query, Mutate, Subscribe?

Querying


type RootQueryType {
   attendees: [Person]
   person(
       # The id to look for
       id: Int
   ): Person
}
            

query {
  attendees {
    id
    name
    profile {
      picture
    }
    friends {
      name
      profile {
        picture
      }
    }
  }
}
  1. Against the schema previous slide
  2. Traversing the friendship graph
  3. Single query, single page

Querying With Variables


type RootQueryType {
   attendees: [Person]
   person(
       # The id to look for
       id: Int
   ): Person
}
            

query MyQueryName ($idVariable: Int) {
  person(id: $idVariable) {
    profile {
      url
    }
  }
}
  1. Against the schema previous slide
  2. Typed, Predictable
